org.apache.dubbo.rpc.cluster

Interface Cluster

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Cluster
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AvailableCluster, BroadcastCluster, FailbackCluster, FailfastCluster, FailoverCluster, FailsafeCluster, ForkingCluster, MergeableCluster, MockClusterWrapper, RegistryAwareCluster

    @SPI(value="failover")
public interface Cluster
    Cluster. (SPI, Singleton, ThreadSafe)

    Cluster Fault-Tolerant
